              City Council

              The six members of the City Council are elected at-large to their positions by the voters and each serves two-year staggered terms. The City of Bee Cave City Council meetings are the second and fourth Tuesday of the month at 6:00 pm, at the City Hall located in the Hill Country Galleria. 

              Any appointment the Council decides to make will help ensure a quorum is maintained, allowing meetings to proceed efficiently and without delay until the next scheduled City Council election on May 3, 2025.

              Contact Bee Cave City Council Members

              Mayor Kara King

              Elected May 2020

              kking@beecavetexas.gov

              Council Member Andrea Willott

              Elected May 2019

              awillott@beecavetexas.gov

               

              Mayor Pro Tem Andrew Clark

              Elected May 2019

              aclark@beecavetexas.gov

              Council Member Kit Crumbley

              Elected 2025

              kcrumbley@beecavetexas.gov

              Council Member Kevin Hight

              Elected May 2021

              khight@beecavetexas.gov

              Council Member Blake Sbrocco

              Elected 2025

              bsbrocco@beecavetexas.gov

              Bee Cave City Hall 4000 GalleriaParkway Bee Cave, TX 78738
              Bee Cave Police Dept. 13333-AHwy 71 W Bee Cave, TX 78738
              Phone (512) 767-6600
